'''''Clear the Area, Please!''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the two [[Tenebrous Mimesis: Tepetlisaurus]] threatening the baby Tepetlisaurs near the westernmost waypoint of [[Ochkanatlan]]. These Tepetlisaurs will then grant the player access to [[Furnace of Fiery Embers|Furnace of Fiery Embers (III)]].
